backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user profiles and game stats with access‑controlled queries and updates for users and admins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping gameplay VFX and rendering features to the frontend files and components they modify.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries listing the purpose of each frontend file across UI, rendering, controls, and persistence.
frontend/docs/IMPLEMENTATION_GUIDE.md: High‑level guide describing project structure and implementation approach for the space shooter game.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind/CSS variables defining OKLCH color themes, dark mode tokens, and base styling rules.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entrypoint loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component controlling menu/game state and syncing high scores via backend stats API.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Internet Identity login/logout button with state handling and React Query cache clearing.
frontend/src/game/controls/Joystick.tsx: Touch joystick component calculating dynamic movement vectors with drag and orientation‑safe handling.
frontend/src/game/controls/ShootButton.t: Touch and mouse reactive shoot button that triggers start/stop shooting events and handles visibility/orientation resets.
frontend/src/game/controls/useCombinedCo: Merges keyboard, joystick, and touch shoot inputs into a single control state with deadzone and magnitude comparison.
frontend/src/game/controls/useKeyboardCo: Tracks WASD/arrow keys and spacebar to produce movement and shooting control values.
frontend/src/game/persistence/useSavedSt: Loads and saves persistent game stats via an actor with React Query caching and invalidation.
frontend/src/game/render/GameCanvas.tsx: Canvas renderer that draws the player, bullets, and other game elements with responsive resizing and neon-styled graphics.
frontend/src/game/types.ts: Defines TypeScript types for all game entities, bullets, enemies, effects, controls, and overall game state.
frontend/src/game/ui/Hud.tsx: HUD displaying score, level, pause button, progress bar, and optional level completion message.
frontend/src/game/ui/TouchControlsDebugO: Debug overlay showing touch detection, forced control state, and pause status.
frontend/src/game/useGameEngine.ts: Main game engine hook managing state, movement, shooting, spawning, scoring, levels, and the game loop.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on the user's identity, refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDynamicViewport.ts: Updates a CSS variable for dynamic viewport height using visualViewport events.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth state, login/logout, and identity loading via a React context.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive CSS variables for theming and responsive sizing.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/screens/GameScreen.tsx: Renders the gameplay view with canvas, HUD, controls, and manages game state events.
frontend/src/screens/MenuScreen.tsx: Displays the main menu with logo, high score, start button, and control instructions.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom OKLCH-based color palette, neon colors, container settings, and custom animations with typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks overall project state, requirements, architecture notes, known issues, and implemented features for a ReactJS neon-style space shooter game.
